name: Car Mechanic Simulator
summary: Take on the role of a professional mechanic and push your skills to the limit as you strive to exceed your clients' expectations. Experience an authentic gameplay, showcasing your expertise with a variety of tools and a vast selection of car parts. Engage in diagnostic work, repairs, painting and the meticulous restoration of intricately detailed cars within your own personalized auto shop. Become a true master of car mechanics!
